com.msi.moble

Class mobleNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msi.moble.mobleNetwork

  • public class mobleNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents top layer of MoBLE stack, which provides API for interaction with user application.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  mobleNetwork.afterDisconnection
      Interface after disconnection
      static interface  mobleNetwork.KeyRefreshCallback
      Interface to process key refresh procedure completion.
      static interface  mobleNetwork.PingPongCallback
      Interface to process Ping Pong callback

    • Field Summary

      mobleAddress mAddress
      Local address of Smartphone in MoBLE network.

      • createNetwork

        public static mobleNetwork createNetwork(mobleAddress address)
        Creates new network with given moble address of SmartPhone (Choose a Unique address for Smartphone , currently it is 1)
        Parameters:
        address - local address of Smartphone.
        Returns:
        reference to the mobleNetwork object.

      • createNetwork

        public static mobleNetwork createNetwork(mobleAddress address,
                                         java.lang.String netKey1,
                                         java.lang.String appKey1)
        Create new network with given moble address of SmartPhone (Choose a Unique address for Smartphone , currently it is 1)
        Parameters:
        address - local address of Smartphone
        netKey1 - String net key - 16 bytes (e.g 210BADAB67132C876B1265BBDEF11901)
        appKey1 - String app key - 16 bytes (e.g 210BADAB67154C876B1265B98EF11901)
        Returns:
        reference to the mobleNetwork object.

      • createNetwork

        public static mobleNetwork createNetwork(mobleAddress address,
                                         byte[] netKey,
                                         byte[] appKey)
        Creates new network with given moble address of SmartPhone (Choose a Unique address for Smartphone , currently it is 1)
        Parameters:
        address - local address of Smartphone
        netKey - byte[] containing 16 byte net key (e.g 210BADAB67132C876222611BDEF11901)
        appKey - byte[] containing 16 byte app key (e.g 210BADA2171345876B1265BBDEF11901)
        Returns:
        reference to the mobleNetwork object.

      • getlibversion

        public static java.lang.String getlibversion()
        Method to get Library version
        Returns:
        String MoBLE Library version

      • backupNetwork

        public mobleStatus backupNetwork(java.io.OutputStream ostm)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves network configuration to output stream.
        Parameters:
        ostm - output stream to write configuration to.
        Returns:
        status of operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on fail to backup network configuration to stream

      • provideSlaveConfiguration

        public mobleStatus provideSlaveConfiguration(java.io.OutputStream ostm,
                                             mobleAddress slaveAddress)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Provides network configuration for a device with given address to output stream. Provided configuration should be restored with restoreNetwork(com.msi.moble.mobleAddress, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) on the slave side.
        Parameters:
        ostm - output stream to write configuration to.
        slaveAddress - address to be assigned for the device.
        Returns:
        status of operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on fail to provide network configuration to stream

      • restoreNetwork

        public static mobleNetwork restoreNetwork(mobleAddress address,
                                          java.lang.String netKey1,
                                          java.lang.String appKey1,
                                          java.lang.String meshdata)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads configuration from the json object.
        Parameters:
        address - local address of Smartphone
        netKey1 - byte[] containing net key
        appKey1 - byte[] containing app key
        meshdata - String of mesh data
        Returns:
        reference to the mobleNetwork object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on fail to restore network configuration from stream

      • restoreNetwork

        public static mobleNetwork restoreNetwork(java.io.InputStream istm)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads configuration from input stream, in which it was saved before.
        Parameters:
        istm - input stream to load configuration from
        Returns:
        reference to the mobleNetwork object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on fail to restore network configuration from stream

      • refreshNetKey

        public boolean refreshNetKey(java.util.Collection<ApplicationParameters.Address> nodes,
                             ApplicationParameters.KeyIndex netIndex,
                             boolean phaseControl,
                             mobleNetwork.KeyRefreshCallback callback)
        Initiates key refresh procedure.
        Parameters:
        nodes - collection of nodes to participate in key refresh procedure.
        netIndex - index of network key to refresh.
        phaseControl - flag to switch between phases index of application key to refresh. If negative then application key is not refreshed.
        callback - callback to be executed when key refresh process is completed.
        Returns:
        true if procedure is started, and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if null is passed as nodes collection or key index

      • refreshAppKey

        public boolean refreshAppKey(java.util.Collection<ApplicationParameters.Address> nodes,
                             ApplicationParameters.KeyPair pair,
                             mobleNetwork.KeyRefreshCallback callback)
        Initiates key refresh procedure.
        Parameters:
        nodes - collection of nodes to participate in key refresh procedure.
        pair - index pair of application key to refresh.
        callback - callback to be executed when key refresh process is completed.
        Returns:
        true if procedure is started, and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if null is passed as nodes collection or key pair

        Method to set Ping Pong Procedure Callback
        Parameters:
        callback - PingPongCallback object
